trans-unit.source: Represents the Behavior objects that are managed by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta gli oggetti di comportamento che sono gestiti da un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class can be extended to develop any type of user interface behavior, including selection, drag, and resize behaviors.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe può essere esteso per lo sviluppo di qualsiasi tipo di comportamento dell'interfaccia utente, inclusi selezione, trascinamento e ridimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Cenni preliminari sul servizio comportamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Your Behavior type must be associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> type.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Tipo di comportamento deve essere associato un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>tipo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: Glyph-independent behaviors are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Non sono supportati i comportamenti indipendenti dall'icona.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> class with the given <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> classe con il determinato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The parent behavior is the next behavior on the behavior stack maintained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Il comportamento padre è il comportamento successivo nello stack di comportamenti gestito da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: If the `callParentBehavior` parameter is `true`, then the `behaviorService` parameter must not be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se il `callParentBehavior` parametro `true`, quindi il `behaviorService` parametro non deve essere `null`.

trans-unit.source: `callParentBehavior` indicates whether the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> class should call the parent behavior, and then allow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> select the correct parent behavior.
trans-unit.target: `callParentBehavior`indica se la base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>classe deve chiamare il comportamento padre e quindi consentire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>Selezionare il comportamento padre corretto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parent behavior should be called if it exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il comportamento padre deve essere chiamato se presente. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: callParentBehavior is , and behaviorService is .
trans-unit.target: callParentBehavioris , and behaviorService is .

trans-unit.source: Gets the cursor that should be displayed for this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il cursore da visualizzare per questo comportamento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> that represents the cursor that should be displayed for this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref> che rappresenta il cursore da visualizzare per questo comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> objects should be disabled.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> oggetti devono essere disabilitati.

trans-unit.source: A `true` value for the DisableAllCommands property indicates to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> that all <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> objects the designer receives should have their state disabled when this behavior is active.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto `true` valore per la proprietà DisableAllCommands indica al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>che tutti <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>gli oggetti nella finestra di progettazione deve essere disattivato quando questo comportamento è attivo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: The DisableAllCommands property works in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A> method so you can customize the interaction between glyphs and behaviors.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà DisableAllCommands funziona in combinazione con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A>metodo ed è quindi possibile personalizzare l'interazione tra i glifi e comportamenti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the results of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A> for a particular <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente riepiloga i risultati di una chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A>per un particolare <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: |||| |-|-|-| ||DisableAllCommands is `true`|DisableAllCommands is `false`| |Hit-tested glyph has an assigned behavior|If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> with the specified `command ID` is found in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>, that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> is disabled and returned.
trans-unit.target: |||| |-|-|-| || DisableAllCommands è `true`| DisableAllCommands è `false`| | Sottoposta a hit test glifo ha assegnato un comportamento | Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>con l'oggetto specificato `command ID` è presente nel <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>che <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>viene disabilitato e restituito.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, `null` is returned.|<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> is called on the behavior and, if found, the behavior’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> is returned.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, `null` viene restituito. | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>viene chiamato sul comportamento e, se trovato, il comportamento <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>viene restituito.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with the specified `command ID` is returned.| |Hit-tested glyph has no assigned behavior|The result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with the specified `command ID` is returned.|The result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with the specified `command ID` is returned.|
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il risultato di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>con l'oggetto specificato `command ID` viene restituito. | | Sottoposta a hit test glifo non è assegnato alcun comportamento | Il risultato di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>con l'oggetto specificato `command ID` viene restituito. | Il risultato di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>con l'oggetto specificato `command ID` viene restituito. |</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> objects the designer receives should have states set to `Enabled = false` when this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> is active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tutti <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> gli oggetti nella finestra di progettazione deve essere impostato su `Enabled = false` quando questo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> è attivo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Intercepts commands.
trans-unit.target: Intercetta comandi.

trans-unit.source: The FindCommand method is called from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Viene chiamato il metodo FindCommand da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: It provides an opportunity for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> to return its own custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>, thereby intercepting this message.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una possibilità per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>per restituire un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>, creando così l'intercettazione di questo messaggio.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: By default, FindCommand returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, restituisce FindCommand <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: Consente un comportamento di trascinamento e rilascio personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> object on which to invoke drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> oggetto su cui richiamare il comportamento di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-enter behavior.
trans-unit.target: Personalizzato consente di trascinamento in entrata comportamento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-enter behavior.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> su cui richiamare trascinare il comportamento in entrata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-leave behavior.
trans-unit.target: Consente un comportamento personalizzato di trascinamento in uscita.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-leave behavior.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> su cui richiamare il comportamento di trascinamento in uscita.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-over behavior.
trans-unit.target: Consente un comportamento di trascinamento personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-over behavior.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> su cui richiamare il comportamento di trascinamento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-and-drop feedback behavior.
trans-unit.target: Consente un comportamento personalizzato commenti e suggerimenti di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> su cui richiamare il comportamento di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Called by the adorner window when it loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dalla finestra dello strumento decorativo quando perde il mouse capture.

trans-unit.source: A behavior can request mouse capture through the behavior service by pushing itself onto the behavior stack with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Un comportamento può richiedere il mouse capture tramite il servizio di comportamento inserendolo nello stack di comportamenti con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: If it does so, it will be notified through the OnLoseCapture method when capture is lost.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, verrà notificato tramite il metodo OnLoseCapture quando si perde l'acquisizione.

trans-unit.source: Generally the behavior removes itself from the stack at this time.
trans-unit.target: In genere il comportamento viene rimosso dallo stack in questo momento.

trans-unit.source: Capture is lost when one of the following actions occurs: - Someone else requests capture.
trans-unit.target: Acquisizione viene persa quando si verifica una delle azioni seguenti:-un altro utente richiede l'acquisizione.

trans-unit.source: - Another behavior is pushed.
trans-unit.target: -Un altro comportamento viene inserito.

trans-unit.source: - This behavior is removed.
trans-unit.target: -Questo comportamento viene rimosso.

trans-unit.source: In each of these cases, OnLoseCapture will be called on the behavior.
trans-unit.target: In ognuno di questi casi, verrà chiamato OnLoseCapture sul comportamento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> su cui richiamare il comportamento di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when any double-click message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando un messaggio di doppio clic nella finestra di strumenti decorativi del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseDoubleClick method is called when any double-click message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnMouseDoubleClick viene chiamato quando viene inserito un messaggio di doppio clic il `WndProc` della finestra adorner. <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Il messaggio viene prima passato qui, per il primo piano <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>nello stack di comportamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Restituzione di `true` da questo metodo indica che il messaggio è stato gestito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>e non deve essere elaborato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: A questo punto, il messaggio viene inviato per il comportamento appropriato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> value indicating which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> valore che indica quale pulsante è stato fatto clic.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the click occurred.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso in cui si è verificato il clic.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il messaggio è stato gestito; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-down message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando un messaggio del mouse nella finestra di strumenti decorativi del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-down message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metodo viene chiamato quando un messaggio del mouse viene inserito il `WndProc` della finestra adorner. <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Il messaggio viene prima passato qui, per il primo piano <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>nello stack di comportamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Restituzione di `true` da questo metodo indica che il messaggio è stato gestito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>e non deve essere elaborato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: A questo punto, il messaggio viene inviato per il comportamento appropriato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> value indicating which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> valore che indica quale pulsante è stato fatto clic.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the click occurred.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso in cui si è verificato il clic.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il messaggio è stato gestito; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-enter message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando un messaggio di mouse entra nell'area della finestra dello strumento decorativo del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-enter message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metodo viene chiamato quando un messaggio viene inserito il `WndProc` della finestra adorner. <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: A questo punto, il messaggio viene inviato per il comportamento appropriato.

trans-unit.source: When the mouse pointer's location is positively hit-tested with a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> than previous hit tests, this method is called on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: Quando la posizione del puntatore del mouse è positivamente sottoposta a verifica con un diverso <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>rispetto alle verifiche precedenti, questo metodo viene chiamato su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>associati <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il messaggio è stato gestito; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-hover message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando un messaggio di passaggio del mouse nella finestra di strumenti decorativi del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-hover message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metodo viene chiamato quando un messaggio di passaggio del mouse viene inserito il `WndProc` della finestra adorner. <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Il messaggio viene prima passato qui, per il primo piano <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>nello stack di comportamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Restituzione di `true` da questo metodo indica che il messaggio è stato gestito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>e non deve essere elaborato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: A questo punto, il messaggio viene inviato per il comportamento appropriato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the hover occurred.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso in cui si è verificato il passaggio.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-leave message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando un messaggio in uscita del mouse nella finestra di strumenti decorativi del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-leave message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metodo viene chiamato quando un messaggio in uscita del mouse entra nell'area di `WndProc` della finestra adorner. <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: A questo punto, il messaggio viene inviato per il comportamento appropriato.

trans-unit.source: When the mouse pointer leaves a positively hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>, this method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Quando il puntatore del mouse esce da un positivamente sottoposta a verifica <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>con un valore valido <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>, questo metodo viene richiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il messaggio è stato gestito; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-move message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando un messaggio di spostamento del mouse nella finestra di strumenti decorativi del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-move message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metodo viene chiamato quando un messaggio di spostamento del mouse viene inserito il `WndProc` della finestra adorner. <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Il messaggio viene prima passato qui, per il primo piano <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>nello stack di comportamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Restituzione di `true` da questo metodo indica che il messaggio è stato gestito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>e non deve essere elaborato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: A questo punto, il messaggio viene inviato per il comportamento appropriato.

trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> valore che indica quale pulsante è stato fatto clic.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the move occurred.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso in cui si è verificato lo spostamento.

trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando un messaggio di rilascio del mouse nella finestra di strumenti decorativi del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-up message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metodo viene chiamato quando un messaggio del mouse entra nell'area di `WndProc` della finestra adorner. <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Il messaggio viene prima passato qui, per il primo piano <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>nello stack di comportamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Restituzione di `true` da questo metodo indica che il messaggio è stato gestito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>e non deve essere elaborato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Sends this drag-and-drop event from the adorner window to the appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> or hit-tested <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Invia questo evento di trascinamento e rilascio dalla finestra dello strumento decorativo visuale appropriati <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> o sottoposta a hit test <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.
